column1: some shape away from the left-hander from over the wicket. Back of a length outside off, and moving away
gets it straighter, back of a length again. Defended from the crease
strays down the pads, but he can't connect with the flick. The ball rolls to short fine off the pad for a leg-bye
good length, keeps it straight on the stumps, Hope pats it back to the bowler
sumptuous shot that's how you get off the mark. Angled across him, and Hope leans into the cover drive to bisect the cordon in the circle and send the ball purring to the fence
good length, slanted a mite across, he defends to point
good length from round the wicket, floated up a bit. Not great turn, he lets it go through outside off
fuller on the stumps, defended back
good length, but angled more into the batsman, who stays in his crease and punches to cover
tossed up on off, and he comes on the front foot to drive, but straight to short cover
tossed up again outside off, he comes forward to defend. Inside-edges on to pad
fine shot, tossed up again but too full and he comes forward to ease this through cover with a pleasing drive. Both batsmen off the mark with boundaries
good length angled into the batsman, who unfurls a crisp cover drive, but straight to the fielder
driven very firmly again, too full outside off and Hope is coming on to the front foot nicely and getting the drives going. But he keeps finding the fielder inside the circle at cover
angled across, and this time Hope punches from close to his body to the left of cover
strays on to the pads, and he flicks him, but not with any conviction. The ball rolls to short midwicket. That was the slower ball, off-cutter
through him almost Got his bat down just in time to this good length one on the stumps and the ball took the toe-end, bounced on the ground and over the stumps. Narrow escape.
given some room outside off and he cuts this to third man
tossed up outside off, he steers it to point
back of a length outside off, punched to cover
flatter on the stumps, pushed back past the bowler to mid-on
tossed up outside off, but drags it down a bit and he uses the turn to go deep in his crease and cut it past point for a nice looking boundary

cuts it straight to point Soft dismissal. It was too short, and he cleared his front leg to try and flay it on the off side, but only ended up thick-edging it. Easy catch for the fielder and West Indies have lost their first
fuller ball on the stumps, he pushes it back to the bowler's right
angled across on a length, steered to point
angled across but drags it down too short. Hope transfers weight back slaps it through cover. So well timed that the man running across from deep cover couldn't get to it
good length on the stumps, defended to cover
strays on the pads, and flicked to square leg
back of a length on the stumps, tucked to short midwicket
fuller length and very straight, opens the face to steer it to third man
tossed up on middle, turning away slightly. He plays with the turn to short midwicket
slightly flatter, Hope skips down the track and wrists it to mid-on
stays in his crease that time and can go back to flick this slightly short of a length, straight ball in the gap at midwicket
flatter on the stumps, a bit fuller too. Bravo pushes it to cover
good length outside off, Bravo comes forward to defend
tossed up on the stumps again, Bravo comes forward to defend again
starts with a full toss and Hope doesn't miss out. Swats this across the line and sends it screaming to the midwicket boundary
better length, flatter on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
good length, flatter on the stumps. He comes forward to defend
drags it slightly short, and Hope, who had stayed in his crease, goes deep inside to flick it to midwicket
nicely tossed up outside off, and he unleashes a big, booming drive but doesn't connect fully. Gets it off the inside half of the bat to long-off
short and wide outside off, but Bravo misses out. Went back and across to slash this through the off side but the ball goes under his bat
dismissed dances down the track, gets to the pitch of hte ball and hits it over mid-off an dto the fence
fuller on the stumps, he comes on the front foot and works it to long-on
past the outside edge pitched fuller, drawing him forward, and spins past the bat
beaten again, and appreciable turn that time. pitched on a length again, and he went for the big heave over cow corner. Hadn't got to the pitch of the ball and it spins past his bat
stays back to nudge this to square leg
gets of the mark by working it to midwicket
edge goes through slip for four too short, and he goes back and across to cut powerfully. Gets an outside edge that goes just past the keeper and into the third man fence.
comes forward to push it to long-on
floated outside off, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep it. There's a man at deep midwicket though, so it's only a single
tossed up on the stumps, on a good length. He comes forward to tickle it to short midwicket
tossed up, fuller ball on the stumps, he goes on the front foot and hits it back powerfully. Shakib gets a hand to it, but can't stop it
flatter outside off, he slaps it to long-off with a horizontal bat
tossed up on leg stump, and worked to midwicket
tossed up again, on middle stump that time, and he brings his bat down straight to drive to long-on
angled into the batsman but too full, and flicked off his toes to mid-on. Quick single taken, and though the fielder hit the stumps direct, Bravo was safe
flatter but strays on the pads, Hope goes back to flick it, but straight to square leg
strays on the pads again, Bravo goes back to flick it finer that time, but finds short fine leg
goes straighter, spinning into him from off stump, and he stands tall to punch to long-on
length outside off, punched off the back foot but straight towards mid-off
length, on middle and leg this time, punched again, this time to a straight-ish short midwicket
back of length once more, in the line of the stumps, punched towards long-on
length, around middle and off, stays back and punches it towards extra cover
a similar line and length, not giving any room to the batsmen, punched once more towards extra cover
slower one, 118 kph, pitching outside leg, Bravo was early into the shot, misses and gets hit on the pads
length on middle and leg, tucked away behind square
length ball, coming in with the arm, Bravo was looking to work it on the leg side, gets beaten and is hit on the pads, was going down
length outside off, steered towards point
length again, just outside off, defended again
short of length, some room as well, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
length outside off, punches it towards long-on
a bit fuller and wider, driven on the up, good connection as well but straight to extra cover
short of length, on the pads, dabbed towards deep square leg
back of length, into the body, defended down the pitch
short of length but down the leg side, goes for the pull, misses but collects a leg-bye to short fine leg
back of length outside off, punches it off the back foot but straight to extra cover, he's not happy with himself there

fuller outside off this time, comes forward and drives it past the extra cover fielder, beats the man in the deep as well, crisp drive that one with class written all over it, a good front foot stride, high elbow and great balance
length, just outside off, defended on the front foot, along the pad
length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, uses his wrists to whip it past the short midwicket on his right
fuller on middle and leg, was tossed up a bit, Bravo looks to break the shackles. Tries to go big down the ground, misses and the ball clatters into the leg stump
floated on a length around off, Samuels was a bit early into the shot, trying to turn it on the leg side, the ball hit the outer half and rolls towards covers
length, but on middle and leg this time, flicked towards short fine leg
length around off, defended from the crease
back of length, bowled from wide of the crease, defended back with a straight bat
fuller on the stumps this time, flicked towards short midwicket
length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
short of length, on the hips, tickled down towards fine leg
back of length around off stump, punched off the back foot towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on for a walking single

down the leg side, goes for a glance and misses, a big appeal for caught-behind but given not out. Bangladesh think of reviewing it but decide against it in the end. Replays show it brushed the pads on its way
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler

length outside off, spins back to beat the forward push and hits him on the back leg, another big appeal denied and this time Bangladesh are reviewing it. A big stride forward, struck in line in front of middle stump but it was spinning way too much, just clipping the top of the leg stump, umpire's call there
too full this time, on the stumps, hits it towards long-on
tossed up outside off, lunges forward and whips it past extra cover for a couple of runs
fuller on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg for an easy single
length outside off, that one just went parallel to the ground, looked like an offcutter. Hope was looking to punch it straight but it does underneath

length outside off, looked like another offcutter, Hope took a step or two towards the ball and looked to flick it away, missed and is struck on the pads, a big appeal and denied again. Bangladesh review, impact in line around middle but was missing leg. Bangladesh lose their review
length, on middle and leg tucks, it away towards square leg
length outside off, steered past backward point
short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball, angling on the pads, Samuels comes forward and looks to defend, gets hit on the pads
fuller around off and middle. Defended back
short of length on the stumps, goes back and works it towards long-on
a low full on middle and leg, helped towards long-on
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-off
arm ball, some bounce as well, Hope goes back and defends it towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards deep extra cover
length outside off, punched through the off side, a misfield there by the extra cover fielder gifts West Indies a boundary, Mashrafe is not happy there
short of length, rising towards the bowler who was looking to pull it away, gets cramped with the ball hitting high on the bat, rolls towards short midwicket
short of length once more, another pull, rolls his wrists over it and hits it to the right of short midwicket
length outside off, punches it towards cover for one
length, on the stumps, punched towards long-on for another single
length outside off, punched towards long-off
length around off, defended back towards the bowler
short of length, outside off, goes for the pull but this one keeps way to low, hits the keeper on the boot
length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, driven to the left of short midwicket, a good stop there
angling on middle and leg, gets to his fifty with a single behind square
starts off with one straying on the pads, and is clipped to deep midwicket
edged for four short and wide outside off, and he pushed at it, but the ball takes a thick edge to fly down to the boundary. May have been half deliberate
back of a length outside off, pushed into the off side
back of a length outside off again, pushed gently towards point. Hope had taken several strides looking for a quick run, but Samuels sent him back
pulled with authority bad first over from Saifuddin, drags this way too short. Samuels knows mid-on is up and he pulls it from outside off to the wide long-on fence
better length, angling into the batsman, but he is able to comfortably tuck this to square leg for a single
given some air outside off, and he gets down low to slap-drive it to extra cover
flatter on the stumps, slightly short, he goes back to punch it past the bowler
fuller ball on off, swipes across the line to send it to long-on
flat but not quick, outside off and turning away from the right-hander. punched to extra cover
fuller on off, driven to cover
good length on the stumps, he goes back and across to tuck it to the  leg side, but straight to midwicket
good length on off, punched to deep cover

bowled off the inside edge short and outside off, it was the off-cutter. Samuels with no movement of feet, just stood in his crease and tried to drive on the up. The ball nips back enough to take the inside edge and crash into the stumps. He's thrown it away after starting slowly and just when he was beginning to look good
angled across, on a good length, pushed to cover
back of a length angling across, steered to point
good length on the stumps, pushed back gently past the bowler
back of a length, angling across, he wanted to flick it from waist high, but gets an under-edge that rolls off pad
ooh, that stopped on the pitch a bit. Good length on off and middle, turning in. Hope had to hold his defensive stroke
edged short of cover not coming on to the bat again, and he tries to transfer weight back and slap it through cover, but gets a leading edge. Falls just short
lets the ball come on to him that time and turns it to midwicket
drifts in, pitches on leg and turns back, Hetmyer had come well forward to defend. Hits him on the pad

given and that looked plumb Mehidy continues his hold over Hetmyer, who's going off without reviewing. Got stuck on the crease, Mehidy uses the angle from around the wicket to get it to dip and skid on, Hetmyer doens't know whether to go forward or back, ends up prodding from the crease with bat beside pad. The ball held its line though and hit pad. Replays show it would have clipped leg stump
fuller on off, clipped back to the bowler
nipping back in sharply from back of a length on off, and keeping low. Half hearted appeal, but that was well down leg, defeated the batsman's attempted whip totally
good length on off, another off-cutter. he wants to drive, but gets an inside edge that rolls away towards square leg
stays back to this one to tickle this round the corner to fine leg
fuller ball outside off, defended solidly to point
comes forward to open the face of the bat and run it down to third man
another off-cutter, nipping back into the batsman from back of a length. that one also kept a tad low, he goes on the back foot to push it out to cover
stopping on the pitch again, he goes back to this fuller ball and defends it into the leg side
stays in his crease again to a fullish ball, and taps it into the leg side
past the outside edge. He came forward to defend, but stayed inside the line. this one didn't turn, ended up going past the edge
slightly shorter, and he goes back to tuck it to square leg
tossed up more on middle stump, he comes forward to turn it to midwicket

taken by the keeper nice loop to the ball, changes his linen to outside off. Rovman is dragged forward to defend, but he's playing for turn that isn't there. At best the ball turned only gently, and takes his outside edge. Mushfiqur holds on, standing up to the stumps. Wait a minute, Rovman has reviewed this. Substitute Carlos Brathwaite has come on and is arguing with the umpires. The commentators on air saying it could be something to do with number of fielders inside the circle/outside it. Brathwaite is still in the middle and gesturing, standing alongside Hope and Powell. On the other side of the pitch the Bangladesh players are gathered. It ends in Brathwaite walking off, and Powell is walking back too. So he's definitely out.
bullet straight drive full ball on the stumps, and Hope comes forward to drive it straight back. Sloppy work from long-on to let it through, but that shot deserved four
fuller ball, driven to cover
back of a length, off-cutter, turned to midwicket
back of a length on off, punched to cover
another off cutter from back of a length outside off. This time he waits for it and punches it through cover
back of a length outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer to short third man
quicker one that drifts on the pads, blocked into the leg side
on a length, he comes forward to tap it to long-on
tossed up on off, and turning into the batsman, he plays with the turn to tickle it to fine leg
given some air outside off, slightly full, he comes forward to clip it to mid-on's right and they take a quick single
drags it down short, and he goes back to flick it to deep square leg
tossed up on a good length, Hope shows the full face of the bat while tapping it back to the bowler
fuller outside off, driven to extra cover

off-cutter goes through the batsman and hits the helmet behind the keeper Chase was too slow to adjust to the shot, the ball goes between his bat and body, Mushfiqur dived to his right and got a glove, but the ball rolled off into the helmet. Five runs, much needed for West Indies
fuller ball outside off, pushed to cover's left for a single
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on. Midwicket tumbles but lets it through and they get a single
fuller ball, pushed to the off side
length ball outside off, he drives fluently by taking a big stride out but straight to cover
back of a length on middle and turning further down leg, he goes back to clip it towards midwicket
tossed up outside off that time, he comes to forward to the pitch of the ball and defends with bat close to pad
too short, on middle and turning away, he tries to clip it but it takes the pad to roll to short fine
fuller on middle, tossed up, big stretch out to defend
pushed to cover
tossed up on off again, he comes well forward to defend back to the bowler
fuller outside off, throws his bat at it, a thick outside edge towards third man
offcutter, length on the pads, tucked away behind square
length outside off, stays beside the line and defends
short of length, punched towards extra cover
length, way outside off, Chase reaches out for it but fails to connect
length, on the stumps, this one kept low as well, pushed towards short midwicket
length on middle and leg and spinning further away, the keeper also fails to collect

length and spinning sharply across the batsman, Mushfiqur moves across swiftly this time and dislodges the bails, a big appeal for stumping, referred upstairs. Was Chase's foot in the air when the bails came off? It's touch and go, we have zoomed in pictures, split screen, stump cam to verify from every angle. We have got a double zoom but it's all pixels there. Nothing conclusive and that stays not out. Was another wide as well
fuller on the off stump, drives it towards long-off
fuller outside off, lunges forward and defends
length around off, defended on the front foot
flatter this time, on the off stump, comes forward and blocks
fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
strays down the leg side and Hope sweeps it fine, past short fine leg beating the fielder on his right for four
starts with a leg side wide
length, angling across the batsman, driven towards deep extra cover
length outside off, stays back and dabs it down to third man
length outside off, steered towards point
short of length outside off, Hope stays beside the line and punches it past the point fielder
length, just outside off, punched towards point
slower one, on the body, defended towards short midwicket
fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
slower in the air, bowled on middle and leg, going with the arm as Chase misses the flick

with so many overs left, why would you play such a shot? down the track, was tossed up outside off, Chase looks to clear the long-off, not exactly to the pitch of the ball and as a result, doesn't middle it, Soumya takes a good overhead catch near the boundary
length around off, comes forward and blocks
length around off, almost chipping it to extra cover
back of length outside off, punched back towards the bowler
length outside off, stays beside and steers it towards point
length, angling across the batsman who was looking to run it down, misses
length again, just outside off and beating the inside edge this time, Allen has no idea what Mustafizur is bowling
cutter this time, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
back of length on middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
fuller, wide outside off, looks to drive it on the up, gets beaten
flighted outside off, comes forward and pushes it back
fuller, just outside off, comes forward and defends
on middle and leg, swept this time but straight to short fine leg
length outside off, some extra bounce, Hope was on the front foot, low, looking to defend, takes off the bottom hand in the end
pitched up and driven towards long-off for a single
length outside off, defended
short of length but down the leg side and called a wide
length outside off, Hope goes back, on his toes, punches it towards deep extra cover
length, angling across the right-hander, beats the bat as he pushes at it
length again, in the line of the stumps, comes forward and defends
cutter, wide outside off, steered but straight to backward point
length, angled across once more, another play and a miss
back of length outside off, punched towards cover
fuller outside off, use of feet to hit it towards long-off, along the ground
length, on the stumps, punched back towards the bowler
slower, on middle and leg, defended
and he gets off the mark with a six! Pitched up on the stumps, clears his front leg and hits it over long-on, all the way for a maximum
length ball, on middle and leg, defended
slower around off, Allen goes for the sweep this time, gets a top edge and Mithun charges forward from deep square leg, takes a tumbling forward, inches off the ground
back of length outside off, looked like a slower one, defended back
angling in this time, wide of the crease, chops it into the ground
an inside edge this time on to the body, was a length ball outside off, Paul was looking to work it on the off side
back of length outside off, defended this time from the back foot
back of length outside off, punched towards extra cover
back of length outside off, pushed towards extra cover once more
length outside off, stands tall and slaps it through extra cover for four
back of length outside off. Punched off the back foot towards covers for a quick run
back of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg one more
down the leg side, keeps way too low, good take by the keeper
punched towards long-on for one
length outside off, defended towards covers
fuller, almost a yorker, digs it out towards the off side
back of a length outside off, driven firmly. Opened the face of the bat too, but point dives to his left to stop it
back of a length, nipping into him from outside off, he stays in his crease and punches to long-on
good length, nipping back in again, he stays in his crease and swats it with a cross-bat to long-on
length ball around off, heaved away to deep square leg
good length outside off, he moves across to flip it behind square. Clever shot, he saw there was a gap and Mortaza's relative lack of pace allowed him to execute it
good length outside off, clipped to long-on
good length on off, he stays back in his crease and guides it to point off an open face
off-cutter, but gets the line wrong and it ends up pitching on middle and going on to the pads. Tucked to square leg
another slower ball, but overpitched and he picks it off his toes to wide long-on
back of a length outside off, nipping in, pushed to cover
slower ball, gets it very full. The batsman adjusts to push it down to long-on
good yorker, but he gets his bat down in time to dig out towards point
good length on off, he pushes it firmly to deep cover
fuller, angled across, he stays in his crease and stands tall to punch to deep cover
straighter, perhaps Keemo was expecting it to angle across. He certainly seemed late on his defensive block back to the bowler

back of a length on the stumps, pushed to short cover. They want a quick single, but Hope sends back Paul. But they get runs anyway because Mortaza has a shy at the batsman's stumps and the ball runs away to deep square leg
angled across and beats his forward poke
angled across but fuller, he punches to extra cover from outside off stump
good length on middle, angling in. He goes on the back foot to work this to long-on
good length on the stumps again, turned towards midwicket. No one close in there and they can take the quick single
backed away and gave himself room, but only manages to toe-end this over the bowler's head with a horizontal swipe. Length ball outside off, he sends it to long-on
goes back and flicks this to fine leg

the stumps have gone for a walk keeps it full and straight, slower one nipping back in. Keemo went for an almighty swing of the bat, he was looking to hit it over long-off possibly. Ends up losing his stumps without getting a touch on the ball
good length outside off, pushed to point's right
fuller on the stumps, Roach shows a straight bat while defending it
angled across, he helps it further by steering it to point
back of a length on the stumps, doesn't rise too high though, but Roach is able to go back and clip it to midwicket
back of a length, angling across him, he stays in his crease and rises up to punch-steer it to point
that moves appreciably. Off-cutter, slowed it down a touch, got Hope forward and prodding, but it zips past his outside edge, opening him up
keeps it straighter, and Hope is able to nudge it to mid-on for a quick single to retain strike
back of a length outside off, he stays back and whips it to long-on
fuller ball, shaping into the batsman who wanted to send it screaming to the cover fence. No contact, and the ball goes through to the keeper between bat and pad, just outside off
stays back to clip this to deep square leg
back of a length, off-cutter, wristed to wide long-on
fuller ball outside off, he wanted to flay it through the offside, ends up chopping on the ground to point

given lbw and he's reviewed it that was just going on with the angle, strikes him below the knee roll from back of a length, but was it missing leg? Struck him in front of middle and leg. He was trying to flick it off the back foot. No bat involved, as Ultra Edge confirms, and it's clipping leg-stump too. Umpire's call, so Roach has to go. The umpire seemed to almost forget he had given it out
he's not farming the strike. Pushes into the off side, where there are large gaps and jogs across for a single
fuller ball outside off, confidently pushed to point
fuller ball on off, driven towards mid-on
good length outside off, but Bishoo confidently goes on the front foot to defend to cover
fuller, angling into the batsman, but he shows the full face again to block it back to the bowler
strays on the pads, and flicked away nicely to midwicket for a couple, to ensure Hope is on strike for the next over
back to back centuries for Shai Hope length ball, but Hope dances down the track. Doesn't quite get to the pitch of it, but follows through with the stroke to hit it over long-off
drags it a bit short and he rocks back to pull powerfully, but short midwicket gets a hand to it to slow down the progress of the ball
tossed up outside off, Bishoo drives it back past the bowler, freeing his arms
good length on leg stump, he went down to sweep but the ball wasn't full enough for it
good length on leg stump again, he comes forward but waits for the ball and tickles it to short fine leg
back of a length angling across, he flat-bats it to deep cover
good length outside off, he pushes at it, gets a thick inside edge that rolls to mid-on
good length, angled across, he opens the face to guide it to short third man. wants a single but is sent back, rightfully so. The throw came rifling in
given room outside off, with Fizz angling it too far across, and he drives on the up, over cover. But there is a sweeper to clean up
angled across, but very full, allowing him to square drive it from one knee
fuller length well outside off, he nudges it to point
digs it in short. Hope went on the back foot early, but got a top edge that pinged off his shoulder and into the leg side
full toss hit in the air but lands safe he heaved across the line at that, didn't get the timing right. The ball balloons up and lands at mid-on. Long-on was running in but had no chance
fuller outside off, flayed through cover but there is a man on the boundary
digs it in short, after seeing Bishoo try to back away. The ball goes past the batsman, with Bishoo pulling out of the shot
slower ball, goes under the bat. It was the off cutter so spun away from off and pat the stumps. Bishoo went down to sweep it into oblivion. Doesn't connect again
good yorker off the last ball, Bishoo manages to get bat on it to dig it out to midwicket. They take the single.
length ball around the wicket, on middle and leg and tucked away towards deep square leg
fuller outside off, leans into the drive and sends it past the mid-off fielder on his left for the first boundary of the innings
shortens his length a bit, Das was looking to drive again, the ball hits the inner half on rolls towards short midwicket
length ball, on middle and leg, defended
length again, around fifth stump, defended with an angled bat this time
punched off the back foot, crunched through covers this time for the second four of the over
short outside off, goes back and cuts but straight to backward point
length around the wicket, spinning away, left alone
flighted outside off, comes forward and soft-hands it on the off side
length outside off, comes forward to defend but deliberately stays inside the line and lets the ball go
short of length, goes back and cuts it past the backward point for his first boundary
length outside off, defended on the front foot
length on middle and leg, flicked past short midwicket for one
length on middle and leg, helped with the angle towards short midwicket
fuller and angling on to the pads once more, tucked away towards deep square leg
length, on middle and leg, defended from the crease
length once more, angling on middle and off, defended again
a similar line and length, stays in the crease and blocks again
fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover but straight to the fielder
fuller outside off, chipped uppishly down the ground, mid-off is at the boundary
length outside off, spin and bounce as Liton goes back for the cut, gets cramped as he chops it down
length outside off, spinning back sharply again, dabbed towards backward point
and some extra bounce once again, length outside off, Liton goes back and dabs it on the off side
a touch flatter on off and middle this time, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
length on middle and leg, tucked away but straight to square leg
length once more, on the body, dabbed towards square leg
a touch fuller this time, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
length, just around off, Tamim comes forward and blocks it under his eyes, bat-pad together
fuller on the stumps, tucked away towards the right of square leg for a quick single, Chase had a shy at the non-striker's end, misses and concedes four overthrows
length, around off, Liton defends it on the off side
tossed up outside off, Tamim lunges forward to block, the ball takes the inner half and rolls in front of square
short and wide, goes for the cut, makes a good connection but hits it straight to point
slower outside off, comes forward and turns it towards square leg
flighted, a touch fuller this time, Liton was on the back foot, flicks it towards short fine leg
looks to come down the wicket but Chase shortens his length, pushed back towards the bowler in the end
fuller, wide outside off, steered towards covers, a fumble but doesn't cost West Indies anything
short of length down the leg side, helped towards fine leg
length outside off, reaches out for it and steers it towards point
length outside off, comes forward and punches it once again towards point
fuller and wider and Liton crashes it past the cover fielder, opens the face of the bat at contact
length outside off, was looking to flick it towards square leg, gets an inside edge on to the box
length around off, gets behind the line of the ball and blocks
length, angled on middle and leg, Tamim goes deep and works it towards midwicket
short and wide, extra bounce, Liton goes for the cut, was in the air for a while but away for the short third man fielder
moves across this time and glances it towards fine leg, with the spin, to get to the other end
flighted outside off, Tamim comes forward leans into the drive, excellent placement as it races through covers, beating the wide long-off in the deep on his right
on the pads this time, tucked away towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and works it towards short midwicket
length ball on the body from around the wicket, tucked away towards square leg
fuller on the pads, flicked towards midwicket, Carlos Brathwaite there substituting for Hope makes a tumbling stop
length outside off, punched towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps, Liton just presents the full face of the bat to caress it between the stumps and the non-striker for four
a touch fuller again, a bit outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
length outside off, punched towards cover-point once more
short and wide, goes for the cut, straight to backward point
length outside off, stays inside the line and lets it go
shuffles in his crease, Chase bowls it fuller on the stumps, clipped towards square leg
fuller outside off, pushes it towards the right of mid-on and sets off for a quick single
down the track but Chase pulls it back, well played in the end after being deceived, thrusts his bat and pad forward
fuller outside off, pushed towards extra cover
swiped across the line and taken at mid-on. Poor shot from Liton. It was back of a length outside off, he tried to pull it. Got a thick top edge that looped up for a fairly simple take.
full ball, angled in from round the wicket, he defends it solidly from the crease
very full on off again, he walks across and works it away for a couple to deep midwicket

loud appeal, not given They've gone for a review. Angled into the batsman again, strikes him flush on the pad in front of middle - but was the angle taking it too far down? Soumya had gone too far across and was trying to work it to midwicket again, but played all around it. Fortunately for him, ball tracking shows it to be clipping and it's umpire's call, so the original decision stays and Soumya survives. Bad shot though.
opens the face to run it down to third man
angling in from wide of the stumps around the wicket again. Tamim defends from the crease towards point
full ball angled into him, he steers it to point
flatter and still full, he comes on the front foot to defend
flattish and full again, but moves the line outside off. He defends again
brings it straighter that time, and he tries to drive, but it goes to mid-off from the inside edge
too full, ends up as a low full toss which is clipped to deep midwicket
given some air and Tamim was playing back to it. It dips and turns near his feet, but he manages to defend it
length ball outside off, he comes forward and nudges it to point's left
back of a length but angling in so there's no room to cut. He drives from close to his body, opening the face to play it to point
given room outside off that time and too full, Tamim unfurls a flowing cover drive. There is a sweeper on the boundary so it won't go all the way
length ball angling into him, he comes forward to drive. Gets the inside half of the bat to mid-on
yorker on target from wide of the crease around the wicket. Dug out to midwicket
fuller length outside off, but too wide and Soumya can feast on that. Leans into the on-drive on the up to send the ball Rolls Roycing to the long-on fence
fuller ball on the stumps, comes forward to drive to long-on
fuller outside off, pushed to point's left. He wants the single, but sent back
toss up on a length outside off, he stretches out to get to the pitch of the ball and drives it to the man on the cover fence
flatter and fuller on the stumps, he stays on the back foot and clips it to deep square leg

through the legs of the man at point flatter outside off, Tamim goes back and cuts it sweetly. The man at point let it go through his legs. Carlos Brathwaite ran round from cover and put in the dive at the fence, but his foot touched the rope while stopping the ball
steered to short third man
fuller ball on the stumps, angled in. Defended towards point
good length on the stumps, Tamim takes a half step forward to block it
good length, angling on the stumps again. Defended back
gets it too straight that time, and Tamim goes across to flick it to midwicket. Another fumble by the man stationed there allows a single
back of a length outside off, he lets it come to him and runs it down to third man
too full an don the pads, easy picking for Tamim. Spoils a good over. All he had to do is lean across and flick it past midwicket
what was that from Soumya? Moves across to a fuller one tossed up outside off. The ball pitched and spun past his bat. He was standing a full set of stumps outside off where it hit
gets the length wrong that time and allows Soumya to move across and turn it to midwicket
good length outside off, pushed to extra cover
full toss dipping on him. Clips it but straight to the mid-on fielder
too short and too wide. Tamim didn't move his feet but got the timing sweet, reaching out with his bat and steering it past point and into the fence
flighted on the stumps, he comes forward to smother it
tossed up outside off, he comes forward and pats it to the bowler's left
flatter and shorter, room outside off. Easy putaway. He just stays back and cuts it to the point fence
strays too far down leg that time and it's a wide.
fuller ball on the stumps, better length. He moves across and pats it into the leg side
good length on off, draws him forward to defend
good length outside off again. He comes forward to defend

bursts through deep midwicket's hands for six rank long hop, he rocked back to pull it, and got hold of it too. But Brathwaite was patrolling the boundary there. He ran to his left and got hands to the ball but couldn't hold on, and it goes for maximum
tossed up well outside off but too full. Tamim goes down and paddles it fine to fine leg
spinning into him from outside off, he gets behind the ball and punches to mid-on
comes down the track and picks it up off his toes to flick to deep midwicket. There's a man there thoughwho collects
too short and he goes down to pull-sweep it past square leg
fuller ball, he goes deep in his crease to punch it to long-on
too full, drifting on the pads and nudged to midwicket, where the fielder dives and saves the single. That will be drinks
length ball on the stumps, moves across to tuck it to square leg
tossed up on a good length outside off, he drives to mid-off
on a good length spinning across him from middle, stopped on the pitch a tad. He waits and pushes it to long on
fuller ball, clipped to short midwicket
tossed up on off, he comes forward to defend
flatter but fuller and outside off, he stretches forward to defend again
tossed up but very full outside off and he comes forward to steer it past point. And oh dear, he's over-stepped. free hit coming up.
moves across to slog sweep it from outside off, but doesn't connect well. Deep square leg collects the ball
good length, turning into the batsman from off. He stays back and punches into the leg side
long hop, not put away. Too short and he rocks back to give it a great thwack, but doesn't connect and only goes as far as short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, he comes forward to tickle it to square leg. A bit of hesitation but they don't take the single in the end
good length on the stumps, punched back to mid-on
fuller on the stumps, he stretches forward to defend
length ball, goes back and forces it towards long-on
fuller on middle and leg, glanced towards fine leg for one more
length, around middle, turned towards square leg for a quick single, Soumya sends him back
another length ball, works it to the left of the square leg fielder this time for one
down the track, stays away on the leg side of the ball and hits it straight over long-off, 89 metres that one
flatter on middle and leg, defended
length outside off, big turn for Bishoo, Tamim waits for it before dabbing it towards short third man
length, pushed off the back foot towards long-on
length, on middle and leg, helped towards backward square leg
sharp turn once again from outside off, Tamim went back to glance it, misses and gets hit on the pads
a touch fuller this time, pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball, spinning on the pads, turned towards backward square leg once more
short of length, and keeping quite low, Soumya goes back and punches it towards long-on
length outside off, a late cut towards short third man for one
length, coming in with the angle, chopped towards covers
length outside off, comes forward before leaving it
length outside off and left alone once again
length, on middle and off, goes back and punches it towards long-on
length on middle and leg, punched towards long-on for one more
length outside off, spinning on the pads, helped towards backward square leg
moves across this time and picks it up from outside off and sweeps it over backward square leg this time, gets to his fifty with that four
length outside off, doesn't turn much this time, defended
length, spinning on the pads, tucked away on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
length on middle and leg, goes down on one knee and guides it towards fine leg
fuller on the stumps, worked towards long-on
length around middle and leg, punched towards long-on for another easy single
pitched up around off, comes forward and clips it towards short midwicket
short of length on middle and leg, worked away towards deep midwicket off the back foot
fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
looked like a googly, fuller outside off, lunges forward and pushes it towards cover
pitched up again, turned away towards short midwicket from the front foot
fuller on off, punched towards long-on
fuller on middle and leg, tickled towards short fine leg
back of length on middle and leg, punched towards long-on
fuller on off this time, pushed towards long-on for one more
bowled across outside off, pushed down the wicket, Allen moves across and makes a stop
pitched up again, turned away towards short midwicket
length ball, spinning on the pads and keep low, almost chipped towards short midwicket
length outside off, goes back and punches it back towards the bowler
googly again, short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep backward point, a sliding stop by Brathwaite near the boundary
length ball, spinning on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
length ball, spinning big from around off stump, goes back to glance it fine, misses and gets hit on the pads
was looking to play a sweep but changes his mind and cuts this length ball towards point
length on off and middle, punched towards short midwicket
backs away and makes some room, hammers it towards long-off, straight to the fielder who was very close the fence
fuller outside off, Tamim fails to dig it out, was there an edge, there might have been but Hetmyer drops the ball. Replays show it was bat hitting the turf, no contact with the ball
fuller again, pushed on the off side
pitched up on middle and leg, digs it out back towards the bowler
fuller once more, whipped towards deep midwicket for one
fuller on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
tossed up, a low full toss on middle leg, pushed towards mid-on
length around off, sharp turn to beat the bat as Tamim was looking to play it off the back foot, an appeal for leg-before, not out
short of length, rocks backs and pulls it towards deep square leg, a diving effort in the deep but in vain
fuller on the stumps, pushes it to short midwicket
gets an under-edge on that to get to fifty Seventh half-century in ODIs. length ball outside off that kept low, he wanted to cut it, but it took the under edge and went in between the keeper's legs
fuller and driven to long-on
fullish on the stumps, he gets to the pitch of the ball to turn it towards square leg
that has wings on it came down the track, got to the pitch perfectly, and the ball was in the right hitting arc for him to swing his arms through, and lift this way over midwicket. 95 metres
quicker one, pitching on off and spinning away, bunted back
more air miles almost a repeat from two balls ago, he comes down the track again to one pushed outside off, frees his arms and swings it high and mighty over midwicket. that went 99 metres
fuller outside off, turned round the corner to fine leg from outside off
flatter outside off, bunted to long-on
shorter and flatter, he rocks back to pull, but goes straight to short midwicket
delicate thrown side of off, flat again. He stays back and late cuts it with finesse to third man
fuller on off, he comes on the front foot to work it to midwicket
good length, wide of off, spinning into him. Stays in his crease and defends
fuller on leg stump, tucked to deep square leg
on leg stump again and turned to deep square leg again
goes straighter now but too full and driven with a straight bat face to long-on
fuller, angling across the batsman, who drives it from off-stump to long-off
length ball but again on leg stump, which allows them to pick of runs to deep square leg by just clipping the ball there
fuller, angling into the batsman from round the wicket that time. Steered to point
given some air, pitches on a length outside off, but he comes on the front foot to defend
flatter, but he comes down the track and tickles it to short fine leg

cracker of a shot he had come down the track the previous ball. This time, he gets it in the slot, outside off and he gives himself room while coming down. Picks it up and cover drives it straight over the fence. Stunning shot
fuller on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
Soumya is in a hurry to finish this goes down on on knee and waits for the ball to come, slog-sweeps it to the square leg fence
down the track again, and I think he was eyeing the midwicket roof but he didn't get hold of it as well. Still got enough meat on it to send it racing to the square leg fence.
back of a length outside off, opens the face to steer to short third man
back of a length on the stumps, he comes down to swat it, but misses completely. The ball goes over the stumps

back of a length, angling into the batsman. He goes for the pull and misses and is struck on the pad. They appeal and go for the review when it's not given. Looked like it would miss leg, but West Indies have to review. Ultra edge shows no bat, but it's a lot closer than it looked. The ball was clipping leg stump, so it's umpire's call. West Indies retain their review, but Soumya survives
another back of length ball angling into him, but this time he doesn't try to hit it too hard. Helps it along to deep midwicket with a more controlled pull
fuller , angling into the pads and straightening a touch. Defended back to the bowler
good length outside off that time, and Tamim comes forward to defend solidly to point
fuller on the stumps, blocked

leg stump goes for a walk might be too late to affect the match, but it's a victory for the bowler nonetheless. Soumya's impetuousness gets the better of him. He tried to whip a ball across the line that was too full, ends up playing all around it, and it sneaks through bat and pad to take out the stumps
good length outside off, he defends off the front foot to point
back of a length outside off, he steers it to third man to get off the mark. The man had to run to his left which allowed them to take two
slower ball, off-cutter bowled on off stump. He's equal to it though and pats it back gently to the bowler's right
good length on off, pushed to extra cover
back of a length angling into the batsman but ends up on his pads, and his turned this to fine leg
oooh, beaten. In the channel outside off, slightly back of a length. Mushfiqur finds himself reaching for it without moving his feet and is beaten
fuller on off stump, driven to extra cover off the front foot

inside edge goes for four well bottom edge technically. This was bowled wide of off, and Mushfiqur went hard at it, again without moving feet. Kept a little low and it takes his under-edge to go to the keeper's left. He got a glove to it, but couldn't stop it
patted back to the bowler
beaten again. In the channel again and Mushfiqur's bat is going like a magnet to the ball in that channel. Feet not moving. He pokes at thin air again
full outside off, given some room and he goes on his knees for a flowing cover drive. However, can't get past the fielder in the circle, who parries it
fuller outside off, and Mushfiqur gets feet moving that time, comes forward to drive it well. But straight to cover
fuller on the stumps, and defended back to the bowler
too short and put away. Room outside off and he's not pacy enough to bowl it so short. Mushfiqur rocks back and cuts it over point
same ball, same shot, better result. short outside off again, and he stays beside the ball, and cuts it uppishly. Goes all the way
keeps it a bit fuller outside off, slapped to cover
full ball outside off, he comes forward and opens the face to steer to point
cheeky length ball outside off and he just comes forward, opens the face of the bat at the last moment to run it down to third man and tie the scores

Bangladesh have won by eight wickets, with 11.3 overs to spare Fuller ball, wide of off, and he goes for the drive, opening the face once again and beating the man at short third man to get the winning runs. Comprehensive win, and Bangladesh take the series 2-1
